# rdatasets

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/jolars/rdatasets.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/jolars/rdatasets)
<!-- badges: end -->

A range of datasets for use in R.

## Installation

You can install the package from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("jolars/rdatasets")
```
